name: Traffic Driver - Next Generation Racing
description:
Get ready to burn up the roads. We will see, if you are a legend or a coward!

Get behind wheels and enjoy the best realistic experience of driving in traffic.
Traffic Driver stands as one of the best infinite racing games.
Traffic driver includes brand new career mode, racing against real player in Arena, and much more.

FEATURES

- Racing against real players
- Eye cam
- 16 different cars
- Real car sounds
- Detailed environment
- Night and Day modes
- Weather modes
- More than 50 career levels
- Amazing real-like graphics
- Realistic traffic system
- Realistic environment sounds
- 4 different camera angles
- Multi Language support

All of these and much more in Traffic Driver.


GAMEPLAY

- Control your vehicle by motion sensor or touching
- Touch right on screen to accelerate
- Touch left on screen to slow down
- You may change vehicle controls through settings


HINTS

- If you drive faster, you can get more money and points
- You can get more money and points by overtaking a vehicle in traffic
- You can modify your car in the garage, and move ahead of your competitors
- You can buy Nitro from garage


Attention: Drive safely and follow traffic rules in real life.
